00121    {  return pressure_; }

00123    // Return true if this is an rigid ensemble.
00124    inline bool BoundaryEnsemble::isRigid() const
00125    { return (type_ == RIGID); }
00126  
00127    // Return true if this is an isobaric Ensemble.
00128    inline bool BoundaryEnsemble::isIsobaric() const
00129    { return (type_ == ISOBARIC); }
